attributes.action: Create social contract for all politicians.
attributes.additional_details:
1 No more tax cuts for the rich
2 No lobbying government.
3 Support the poorest in our society
4 Millionaire/billionaire should advise government, not run it.
5 support unions
6 keep the NHS and education out of debt.
attributes.background: Create a social contract so that all politians will have to work in accordance with an agreement that establishes moral and political rules of behavior.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what policies to pursue are a matter for individual politicians and political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
